resources.string:
BoD No Lock v1.1.0

· BoD@JRAF.org
· www.JRAF.org/android

Copyright (C) 2010-2017 BoD (aka Benoît LUBEK).

Please note that a home screen widget is also available.

Please also note that when locking is disabled, if you turn \'Airplane mode\' on and off, you won\'t be able to type your PIN thus voice and data won\'t work! That\'s because the PIN dialog appears only after unlocking.
If that happens, simple re-enable locking and turn off and on the screen: the PIN dialog will appear.

Please don\'t send me a mail asking if the volume buttons can be disabled, as unfortunately this cannot be done.
